this_title: La course à la planète rouge Season 1
trans_title: 殖民紅色星球 第一季
introduction: Scientists and engineers dream of a manned mission to Mars - it’s a place where life is possible. The race is on to get there: nine months out and nine months back. This is the story of mankind’s preparation to colonise the red planet.E1. The VoyageE2. Human FactorE3. The Red Planet
chinese_title: 殖民紅色星球 第一季
foreign_title: La course à la planète rouge Season 1
